body: We gotta make sure we ship these alongside Atom then or else we get :boom:

@zcbenz Looks like this is causing link failures with node.dll:

```

per environment.x86 False link.exe /nologo /IMPLIB:node.dll.lib /DLL /OUT:node.dll @node.dll.rsp" 2 mt.exe rc.exe "obj\vendor\node\node.node
.dll.intermediate.manifest" obj\vendor\node\node.node.dll.generated.manifest
```

@paulcbetts Somehow a commit of brightray was lost, the master branch should work now.
